subject: Real Estate
title: Remote Work's Geographic Reshuffling
description: Learn Remote Work's Geographic Reshuffling in one minute.

hook.text: In 2020, San Francisco rents dropped 25%. Boise, Idaho prices jumped 40%. Same year, opposite directions.

buildup.text: Remote work untethered millions from offices. Workers left expensive cities for affordable towns with space.

discovery.text: International digital nomad visas â€” offered by 50+ countries â€” let workers live wherever they choose.

twist.text: But the shift is uneven. Local wages in small towns can't compete with big-city salaries chasing their homes.

climax.text: Remote work didn't just change where people live. It exported urban housing pressure to rural markets worldwide.

punchline.text: Remote workers brought city prices to small-town streets.
